source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic shot of a tall, white lighthouse situated in a desolate, rocky desert landscape. In the background, vast, pale mountains stretch into the hazy distance under a clear sky. The camera slowly rises, revealing more of the expansive and arid environment.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenic shot of a tall, white lighthouse situated in a desolate, rocky desert landscape. In the background, vast, pale mountains stretch into the hazy distance under a clear sky. The camera slowly rises, revealing more of the expansive and arid environment.

generated_critique: The caption accurately describes the visual elements and the camera's motion. However, it can be improved for conciseness and to better integrate the description of the motion with the scenery. The first two sentences describe a static scene, while the motion is mentioned separately in the third sentence. The phrase "This is a scenic shot of" is also introductory and unnecessary. To better follow the instructions, the description of the camera's movement should be combined with the description of the landscape it reveals, creating a single, more dynamic sentence.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The camera slowly rises past a tall, white lighthouse, revealing a vast, arid landscape of rocky terrain and pale mountains stretching into the hazy distance.
